import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import ReusableTable from "../../layouts/ReusableTable";

const ExamplePage = () => {
  const [instagramMedia, setInstagramMedia] = useState([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);

  // Fetch media from backend
  const loadMedia = async () => {
    try {
      const res = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/auth/instagram");
      const data = await res.json();
      setInstagramMedia(data);
      setLoading(false);
    } catch (err) {
      console.error("Frontend Fetch Error:", err);
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  // Update prompt
  const handlePromptChange = async (id, value) => {
    setInstagramMedia((prev) =>
      prev.map((m) => (m.mediaId === id ? { ...m, prompt: value } : m))
    );

    await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/auth/prompt/${id}`, {
      method: "PUT",
      headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
      body: JSON.stringify({ prompt: value }),
    });
  };

  // Update tool
  const handleToolChange = async (id, value) => {
    setInstagramMedia((prev) =>
      prev.map((m) => (m.mediaId === id ? { ...m, tool: value } : m))
    );

    await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/auth/tool/${id}`, {
      method: "PUT",
      headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
      body: JSON.stringify({ tool: value }),
    });
  };

  // Load once + auto-refresh every 15 minutes
  useEffect(() => {
    loadMedia();
    const interval = setInterval(loadMedia, 900000);
    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, []);

  const columns = [
    { key: "sno", label: "S.no" },
    { key: "image", label: "Image" },
    { key: "uploadTime", label: "Upload Time", hideOnMobile: true },
    { key: "promptInput", label: "Prompt" },
    { key: "toolInput", label: "Tool" },
  ];

  const tableData = instagramMedia.map((item, index) => ({
    ...item,
    sno: index + 1,
    uploadTime: new Date(item.timestamp).toLocaleString(),
    promptInput: (
      <textarea
        className="border p-1 rounded w-full max-w-full resize-none"
        placeholder="Enter prompt..."
        value={item.prompt || ""}
        onChange={(e) => handlePromptChange(item.mediaId, e.target.value)}
      />
    ),
    toolInput: (
      <input
        className="border p-1 rounded w-full max-w-full"
        placeholder="Enter tool..."
        value={item.tool || ""}
        onChange={(e) => handleToolChange(item.mediaId, e.target.value)}
      />
    ),
    image: (
      <img
        src={item.image}
        alt="media"
        className="w-16 h-16 sm:w-20 sm:h-20 object-cover rounded-lg"
      />
    ),
  }));

  return loading ? (
    <p className="text-center p-4">Loading...</p>
  ) : (
    <div className="p-4 sm:p-6">
      <ReusableTable
        title="Uploaded Images"
        columns={columns}
        data={tableData}
        showActions={false}
      />
    </div>
  );
};

export default ExamplePage;











import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import ReusableTable from "../../layouts/ReusableTable";

const UserList = () => {
  const [videos, setVideos] = useState([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);

  // Update prompt
  const handlePromptChange = async (id, value) => {
    setVideos((prev) =>
      prev.map((v) => (v.mediaId === id ? { ...v, prompt: value } : v))
    );

    await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/auth/videos/prompt/${id}`, {
      method: "PUT",
      headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
      body: JSON.stringify({ prompt: value }),
    });
  };

  // Update tool
  const handleToolChange = async (id, value) => {
    setVideos((prev) =>
      prev.map((v) => (v.mediaId === id ? { ...v, tool: value } : v))
    );

    await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/auth/videos/tool/${id}`, {
      method: "PUT",
      headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
      body: JSON.stringify({ tool: value }),
    });
  };

  // Fetch videos from backend
  const loadVideos = async () => {
    const res = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/auth/videos");
    const data = await res.json();
    setVideos(data);
    setLoading(false);
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    loadVideos(); // first load
    const interval = setInterval(loadVideos, 900000); // refresh every 15 min
    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, []);

  const columns = [
    { key: "sno", label: "S.no" },
    { key: "video", label: "Video" },
    { key: "uploadTime", label: "Upload Time" },
    { key: "promptInput", label: "Video Prompt" },
    { key: "toolInput", label: "Video Tool" },
  ];

  const tableData = videos.map((item, index) => ({
    ...item,
    sno: index + 1,
    uploadTime: new Date(item.timestamp).toLocaleString(),
    video: (
      <video
        src={item.video || item.image}
        controls
        className="w-40 h-24 rounded"
      />
    ),
    promptInput: (
      <textarea
        className="border p-1 rounded w-full"
        placeholder="enter prompt..."
        value={item.prompt || ""}
        onChange={(e) => handlePromptChange(item.mediaId, e.target.value)}
      />
    ),
    toolInput: (
      <input
        className="border p-1 rounded w-full"
        placeholder="enter tool..."
        value={item.tool || ""}
        onChange={(e) => handleToolChange(item.mediaId, e.target.value)}
      />
    ),
  }));

  return loading ? (
    <p className="text-center p-4">Loading videos...</p>
  ) : (
    <ReusableTable title="Uploaded Videos"columns={columns} data={tableData} showActions={false} />
  );
};

export default UserList;









import React, { useState, useMemo } from "react";

const ReusableTable = ({
  columns = [],
  data = [],
  rowsPerPage = 10,
  showActions = true,
  title = "Table",
}) => {
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);

  // Pagination logic
  const totalPages = Math.ceil(data.length / rowsPerPage);
  const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * rowsPerPage;
  const endIndex = startIndex + rowsPerPage;
  const currentData = data.slice(startIndex, endIndex);

  return (
    <div className="w-full overflow-hidden bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-4 sm:p-6">
      {/* Title */}
      <div className="text-xl sm:text-2xl font-bold mb-4 text-center">{title}</div>

      {/* Table */}
      <div className="overflow-x-auto w-full rounded-lg">
        <table className="min-w-full table-auto divide-y divide-gray-200">
          <thead className="bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-50 to-indigo-50">
            <tr>
              {columns.map((col) => (
                <th
                  key={col.key}
                  className={`px-3 sm:px-6 py-2 text-left text-xs sm:text-sm font-semibold text-gray-600 uppercase ${
                    col.hideOnMobile ? "hidden sm:table-cell" : ""
                  }`}
                >
                  {col.label}
                </th>
              ))}
              {showActions && <th className="px-3 sm:px-6 py-2 text-right text-xs sm:text-sm font-semibold text-gray-600 uppercase">Actions</th>}
            </tr>
          </thead>

          <tbody className="bg-white divide-y divide-gray-100">
            {currentData.length > 0 ? (
              currentData.map((row, idx) => (
                <tr key={row.id || idx} className="hover:bg-gray-50">
                  {columns.map((col) => (
                    <td
                      key={col.key}
                      className={`px-3 sm:px-6 py-2 text-xs sm:text-sm text-gray-900 ${
                        col.alignRight ? "text-right" : ""
                      } ${col.hideOnMobile ? "hidden sm:table-cell" : ""}`}
                    >
                      {row[col.key]}
                    </td>
                  ))}
                  {showActions && (
                    <td className="px-3 sm:px-6 py-2 text-right text-xs sm:text-sm font-medium">
                      {/* Add custom action buttons if needed */}
                    </td>
                  )}
                </tr>
              ))
            ) : (
              <tr>
                <td
                  colSpan={columns.length + (showActions ? 1 : 0)}
                  className="px-6 py-4 text-center text-gray-500 text-xs sm:text-sm"
                >
                  No data found.
                </td>
              </tr>
            )}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>

      {/* Pagination */}
      <div className="mt-4 flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between items-center gap-2 sm:gap-0">
        <span className="text-xs sm:text-sm text-gray-500">
          Showing {startIndex + 1} to {Math.min(endIndex, data.length)} of {data.length} results
        </span>
        <div className="flex space-x-2">
          <button
            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(Math.max(currentPage - 1, 1))}
            disabled={currentPage === 1}
            className={`px-2 py-1 text-xs sm:text-sm border rounded ${
              currentPage === 1 ? "bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed" : "bg-white text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50"
            }`}
          >
            Previous
          </button>
          <button
            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(Math.min(currentPage + 1, totalPages))}
            disabled={currentPage === totalPages}
            className={`px-2 py-1 text-xs sm:text-sm border rounded ${
              currentPage === totalPages ? "bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed" : "bg-white text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50"
            }`}
          >
            Next
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default ReusableTable;
